snippet: Some of the nation's biggest brokerage firms appear to be giving a handful of top hedge funds an early peek at research analysts' views, Gretchen Morgenson reports in The New York Times.
abstract: Some of the nation's biggest brokerage firms appear to be giving a handful of top hedge funds an early peek at research analysts' views, Gretchen Morgenson reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Surveys Give Big Investors an Early View From Analysts
